bioAsHtml: I am a Computer Science student at the University of Birmingham and I am currently doing a placement year at IBM as a WebSphere Application Server Developer Advocacy Intern based at IBM's R&D Laboratory in Hursley, UK. I am interested in learning new technologies in the area of AI, specifically Machine Learning, Neural Networks and Robotics.

acceptedTalks.title: Hands-on Robust, Lightweight Microservices with Eclipse MicroProfile

bio: I am a Computer Science student at the University of Birmingham and I am currently doing a placement year at IBM as a WebSphere Application Server Developer Advocacy Intern based at IBM's R&D Laboratory in Hursley, UK.
